item.title: about
item.description:
Docker Saigon is the community of Docker users in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

Where can you find us?

  • Meetup
  • GitHub
  • Youtube
  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Slack (auto-invite app)
  • Reddit

Docker?

Docker is an open-source project to easily create lightweight, portable, self-sufficient containers from any application. The same container that a developer builds and tests on a laptop can run at scale, in production, on VMs, bare metal, OpenStack clusters, public clouds and more.

See our Docker Fundamentals live streaming at Lazada… (link to video pending)

Thanks for reading!

item.title: contact
item.description: Want to get in touch with us? Fill out the form below to send us a message and we will try to get back to you as soon as possible!

item.title: Welcome
item.description: This is the first post in Docker Saigon Blog. Let’s hope everything works as expected
